price: 106. Weydiisana Denbi Dhaaf Alle, Hubaal, Alle waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan41.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَغۡفِرِ ٱللَّهَۖ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ كَانَ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا
footnotes: 41. Abuu Hurayra a.k.r. waxaa laga soo weriyey inuu yidhi: Waxaan maqlay Rasuulkii Alle s.c.w. oo leh: Wallaahi, Waxaan denbi dhaaf weydiistaa Alle oo u toobad keenaa wax ka badan toddobaatan jeer maalintii.» (W.w. Al-Bukhaari).

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-is'taghfiri al-laha inna al-laha kāna ghafūran raḥīman
